name: Eye Am Searching
description:
Howath lost one eye two years ago. It mutated, got aggressive and flew!
Help Howath on his short adventure through 19 levels: Find his eye and stop it before it destroys more lives!

Using your weapons makes them stronger and lets them gain enough power to stop his eye!

Controls: WASD, Left and right mouse button, SPACE

This is my second finished game. Feedback is appreciated!

@Kyuranx

__Update v1.0.1__

- Balancing
- Sound tweaking

__Update v1.0.2__
- Fixed gravity/jump for a more controllable jump

__Update v1.0.3__

- Jumping with "W" now possible
- More balancing
- Tweaked particles
